name: Long Leash
description:
CONTROLS

Move with the Arrow Keys

GAMEPLAY

Do the best score by spraying mayhem trough town as fast as possible,  as an excited dog pulling on his leash!

Bark at birds, tip over trashcan and mark your territory, but don't hurt your owner in the process!

THEME

This game was created for the GameMaker ToolKit Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together"

CREDIT

A game by the 'Guilloteam' : Delphin Casado, Adrien Jeannerod, Florent Lahalle, Julien Revel and Clément Ribeyre-Soret.
